result.execSummary:
The defendant Richard D Steinke was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Richard D Steinke is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Richard D Steinke was found guilty of Possession of Methamphetamine, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(g).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Eau Claire County cases 14CF852 and 15CF240 Read-In and Dismissed.

miscConds.notes: PAY DIRECT TO CLERK OF COURT, ANY BOND APPLIES
Defendant must complete AODA and follow recommendations and attend 1 AA meeting per week.
